items.text: finds cover point! Mehidy goes a long way into the leg side and deep into the crease. He wants to crash this through the covers, but Jadhav has made him wait and wait and his hurried flap at this won't go further than Rayudu
items.postText:
Imrul Kayes in at 3

Shashank from Dubai: "Would've been surprised if it wasn't anything but absolute lack of pace that got Jadhav a wicket. Mehidy was tiring, cramping between overs, lost strength in his forearms, and yet looked for an expansive cut when he could've bunted the ball into the vacant midwicket region that wasn't manned."
items.shortText: Jadhav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, OUT

dismissal.text: Mehidy Hasan Miraz c Rayudu b Jadhav 32 (59b 3x4 0x6) SR: 54.23

items.text: length ball skidding into leg stump. Punched to midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Jadhav to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: short of a length and slow outside off. Chopped into the covers
items.shortText: Chahal to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length on off stump, gets deep in the crease and punches to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Chahal to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, pushed into the covers off the outside half of the bat
items.postText: Divy: "Open with mehidy, then send in imrul next. Bangladesh have come up with a brand new strategy to usurp India, and has worked pretty fine so far. India need to make changes accordingly and maybe spring a couple of surprises of their own."
items.shortText: Chahal to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: full on off stump, driven with the turn to long-on
items.shortText: Chahal to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: shot. Tossed up wide outside off, slashed to sweeper's left
items.postText: Vamsi : "Mehidy has more than done his job. If he is cramping up or losing strength, it is better that he got out. He has a very big role to play in the second innings and now its time for the other batsman to take this solid platform forward."
items.shortText: Chahal to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: length ball pitches on leg and goes down further
items.shortText: Chahal to Imrul Kayes, 1 wide

items.text: short of a length outside off, flicks to square leg off the back foot
items.shortText: Chahal to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: full toss on off stump, punched to long-off
items.shortText: Jadhav to Liton Das, 1 run

items.preText: Around the wicket now, slip in place
items.text: short of a length and fired in at middle stump. Punched to extra cover
items.shortText: Jadhav to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: full outside off, jammed to point
items.shortText: Jadhav to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: yorker length at off stump, driven to long-off
items.shortText: Jadhav to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: short outside off, gets back and punches to the bowler
items.shortText: Jadhav to Liton Das, no run

items.text: shot!Not a lot of pace on this short ball outside off. But he manages to play the late cut and bisect backward point and short third man
items.postText:
Arumugham GR: "BD aiming for the kill here, keep the performing middle order for the later overs (after 30ov) so that they have the freedom to score and post a very good total. Anything 270+ would be a challenging total to chase"

Angel Stevenson: "Are we gearing up for a Nidahas Trophy type of nail-bitting, armpit-staining, teeth-clenching final?!!!?!!!" --- What were you doing with your underarms...
items.shortText: Jadhav to Liton Das, 2 runs

items.text: length on off stump, slides on with the angle and takes the leading edge as he look to flick
items.shortText: Chahal to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: length on leg stump, tapped to midwicket
items.shortText: Chahal to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: full outside off, driven back to the bowler
items.shortText: Chahal to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: googly lobbed up full on leg stump, flicked to square leg
items.shortText: Chahal to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: given lbw! Kayes reviews. That's a top ball from Chahal, but has that struck outside off? It's ripped past the inside edge and hit him on the back thigh as he's pushed forward. Looks good but this will come down to impact. No bat on it...impact is umpire's call. That's hitting the stumps. Kayes is gone. That was very close. Length ball dipped nicely outside off and he was playing outside the line
items.shortText: Chahal to Imrul Kayes, OUT

dismissal.text: Imrul Kayes lbw b Chahal 2 (12b 0x4 0x6) SR: 16.66

items.text: length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
items.postText: Must add that the review is retained because it was umpire's call.

items.text: length on off stump, tapped into the off side
items.shortText: Jadhav to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length on off stump, punched to long-on off the back foot

items.text: short of a length outside off, looks to force it through the off side, gets it down the pitch off the inside half

items.text: short and wide outside off, under-edged cut to point
